question: Which system of equations can be used to find the cost, in dollars, of each video game and each DVD at the store?
stem: Ken and Jerome went to the same electronics store. Ken bought 2 video games and 1 DVD for a total of $105. Jerome bought 1 video game and 4 DVDs for a total of $105. Each video game cost v dollars and each DVD cost d dollars. Which system of equations can be used to find the cost, in dollars, of each video game and each DVD at the store?
